bibl.title: Literary Fashions and the Transmission of Texts in the Graeco-Roman World.
G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays
bibl.author: KILPATRICK, G.D.

bibl.note: Reproduit de: Center for Hermeneutical Studies in Hellenistic and Modern Culture (Graduate Theological Union and the University of California, Berkeley). Protocol of Colloquy. 19 (1976) pp. 1-8. - Relates certain features of the transmission of the New Testament to that of Classical texts, using the papyrological evidence.
KILPATRICK G.D., Literary Fashions and the Transmission of Texts in the Graeco-Roman World.
G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays (Leuven, 1990) pp. 63-72.
